name: Space Duel (itch) (YAGoOaR)
description:
The "Space Duel"  is a small game made as work for a gamedev Coursera course.

Info for course

Significant modifications made(compared to the game developed through the course tutorial):

  • Reworked all spaceship and projectile physics - made them cool and more realistic.
  • Reworked the game environment - added endless world feature, infinite interactive parallax background
  • Interface changes: added player and enemy healthbars and icons, added enemy marker when outside fov, added interactive parallax background to menu.
  • Added new enemies and enemy behaviour - added missile weapons for enemy. 
  • Added default and advanced(movement prediction) guidance for missiles.

Other cahnges:

  • Added trails
  • Added simple main menu instructions
  • Added moving asteroids to the endless map
  • Added a boss with all 3 enemy weapon types

Inspired by Event Horizon game

Credits:

Made by YAGoOaR
